# 2012 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's singles__disambig_1

Evgeny Donskoy
| runner =  Marsel İlhan
| score  = 6–3, 6–4
}}
Mikhail Kukushkin was the defending champion but decided not to participate.
Evgeny Donskoy won the title, defeating Marsel İlhan 6–3, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Cedrik-Marcel Stebe (second round)
#  Karol Beck (semifinals)
#  Andrey Golubev (second round)
#  Marsel İlhan (final)
#  Evgeny Donskoy (champion)
#  Konstantin Kravchuk (first round)
#  Yuki Bhambri (quarterfinals)
#  Kamil Čapkovič (first round)
}}
